function Main({activeNote,onDeleteNote}){ const title = activeNote?.title || ''; const date = activeNote?.dateCreated || ''; console.log(title) return (
{new Date(activeNote.dateCreated).toLocaleString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "2-digit", day: "2-digit", hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", second: "2-digit" }).replace(/\//g, "-")}

onDeleteNote(activeNote.id)}>Delete
